name: Control Freak (itch)
description:
Control Freak

Have you ever felt like you lost control? Felt like you weren't the one that made your decisions? You probably haven’t felt it as much as you have after playing Control Freak. After your boss tried to brainwash you into working for him, however you escaped and he is trying everything to get you back into his company. Try to escape, I bet you can’t!

Compatibel: Windows 7,  Windows 8, Windows 10
Laptop: If played on laptop we suggest you play with charger

Donations are always welcome so we can work on updates.
Thank you in advance.
